🆘 Tic Tac Toe – Help Screen

🎯 Objective
Get 3 of your marks in a row — horizontally, vertically, or diagonally — before your opponent.

🎮 How to Play
- You play as X (or O).
- The board is numbered like this:

  1 | 2 | 3
 ---+---+---
  4 | 5 | 6
 ---+---+---
  7 | 8 | 9

- On your turn, type the number of the cell where you want to place your mark.

📝 Rules
- Players take turns.
- X always goes first.
- The game ends when:
  - A player forms a line of 3 marks.
  - All cells are filled (draw).
